DataElement.preferredName: Protocol Deviation Occurrence Participant Action Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to a protocol deviation as to why a participant may not continue on the study.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the occurrence of a protocol deviation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An unintended departure from the study plan which has not been prospectively reviewed and approved by the IRB and FDA.

Concepts.definition: A variation from processes or procedures defined in a protocol. Deviations usually do not preclude the overall evaluability of subject data for either efficacy or safety, and are often acknowledged and accepted in advance by the sponsor. (CDISC Glossary)

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity._A thing done._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Something that is not planned or anticipated.: A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.: A process of becoming larger, more numerous, more important, or more likely.: The potential future harm that may arise from some present action. It is often combined or confused with the probability of an event which is seen as undesirable.

Concepts.definition: Something that is not planned or anticipated.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.
A process of becoming larger, more numerous, more important, or more likely.
The potential future harm that may arise from some present action. It is often combined or confused with the probability of an event which is seen as undesirable.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Continue Serious Non-Compliance With Study Device

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Continue Serious Non-Compliance With Study Device
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.: Causing fear or anxiety by threatening great harm; of great consequence.: An indication that a subject has not agreed with, or followed the instructions related to, the study device.

Concepts.definition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.
Causing fear or anxiety by threatening great harm; of great consequence.
An indication that a subject has not agreed with, or followed the instructions related to, the study device.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.:A thing done.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
